description: The forger who saved 1000s of Jews from the Nazis
extended: During the German occupation of France, teenager Adolfo Kaminsky forged thousands of documents for Jews about to be deported to concentration camps.

description: Supa Bwe and Chance The Rapper Get Animated in “Fool Wit It” | YK La Familia
extended: One of the fan favorites from Supa Bwe’s recent Dead Again 3 mixtape has received a proper visual treatment. With Cam O’bi on production, the track opens with an effortless verse from Chance the Rapper before handing off the mic to Supa.

description: ‘Trump Is The Real Face Of America,’ Arabs Say After Debate - Vocativ

extended: This is the fourth of four posts examining the evolution of presidential transitions. Click here for the third part. Presidential transition has changed dramatically over the past several decades, as the demands on the presidential office and on the executive branch have vastly increased.

description: LSD Now: How the Psychedelic Renaissance Changed Acid - Rolling Stone
extended: On October 6th, 1966, nearly a thousand participants and three bands – including the Grateful Dead – gathered in the Panhandle of San Francisco's Golden Gate Park to observe the criminalization of LSD in California and New York.
